about_the_game:
The Mushroom 11 Soundtrack contains 15 tracks from legendary Electronica supergroup The Future Sound of London (FSOL), including previously unreleased tracks only available through the Mushroom 11 Soundtrack!

Tracks

01 Underground (Field of Flowers)
02 Urban Blight (A Corner)
03 Macrobiotics (North Arctic)
04 Cul-De-Sac (River Delta)
05 Late Harvest (Summer's Dream)
06 Orderly Fashion (Plough)
07 Formaldehyde (Environments 1)
08 Cremator (A Glitch In Cellular Memory)
09 Remorseful (Environments 1)
10 Lost and Found (The Empty Land)
11 Anew (End Of The World)
12 Wave Stat (Unreleased)
13 TX 81z Another Brother (Unreleased)
14 The Equevalents (Unreleased)
15 End of The World (Unreleased - String Version)
